languages.text: "Прошу, поймите меня... раньше я не могла вам доверять. Я расскажу свою историю, и вы увидите, почему!" {n}Арджента делает паузу.{/n} "Я начну издалека, потому что так проще сложить всю мозаику. Попав в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} и на Футфол, я обрела здесь не предназначение, но лишь муку. Я не была нужна — реликварий, который мне назначалось оберегать, и так надежно охранялся миссией отца Иеронимуса. Да никто и не пытался его осквернить — Футфол, при всем своем беззаконии, чтит веру в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу, поймите меня... раньше я не могла вам доверять. Я расскажу свою историю, и вы увидите, почему!" {n}Арджента делает паузу.{/n} "Я начну издалека, потому что так проще сложить всю мозаику. Попав в сектор {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронус{/g} и на Футфол, я обрела здесь не предназначение, но лишь муку. Я не была нужна — реликварий, который мне назначалось оберегать, и так надежно охранялся миссией отца Иеронимуса. Да никто и не пытался его осквернить — Футфол, при всем своем беззаконии, чтит веру в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, поймите меня... раньше я не могла вам доверять. Я расскажу свою историю, и вы увидите, почему!" {n}Арджента делает паузу.{/n} "Я начну издалека, потому что так проще сложить всю мозаику. Попав в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g} и на Футфол, я обрела здесь не предназначение, но лишь муку. Я не была нужна — реликварий, который мне назначалось оберегать, и так надежно охранялся миссией отца Иеронимуса. Да никто и не пытался его осквернить — Футфол, при всем своем беззаконии, чтит веру в {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in Koronus and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well-protected by Father Hieronimus's mission. And no one was trying to defile it in the first place — for all its lawlessness, Footfall honors the worship of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “希望你能理解……我之前并不信任你。我会告诉你过去发生的事情，这样你就明白原因了！”{n}阿洁塔顿了顿。{/n}“我来从头讲起吧，这样会比较容易听明白。当我抵达{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，来到落脚港之后，我完全找不到我的使命。这里只有煎熬，根本没人需要我。我被派来守护圣骨匣，但希罗尼穆斯的牧师已经把它保护得很好了。甚至可以说，根本没人打算玷污这件圣物。尽管落脚港是个无法无天的地方，但对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的信仰依然受人尊重。”
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “希望你能理解……我之前并不信任你。我会告诉你过去发生的事情，这样你就明白原因了！”{n}阿洁塔顿了顿。{/n}“我来从头讲起吧，这样会比较容易听明白。当我抵达{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}，来到落脚港之后，我完全找不到我的使命。这里只有煎熬，根本没人需要我。我被派来守护圣骨匣，但希罗尼穆斯的牧师已经把它保护得很好了。甚至可以说，根本没人打算玷污这件圣物。尽管落脚港是个无法无天的地方，但对{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的信仰依然受人尊重。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Tiene que entender que... no podía confiar en usted hasta ahora. ¡Le contaré mi historia y verá por qué!». {n}Argenta hace una pausa.{/n} «Empezaré por el principio, así me será más fácil explicar las cosas. Al llegar a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g} y a Paso, no encontré mi destino, sino un tormento. El relicario que se me había encomendado proteger ya estaba a buen recaudo en manos de la misión del reverendo Hieronymus. Además, nadie estaba intentando profanarla. Pese a su falta de leyes, Paso respeta el culto al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene que entender que... no podía confiar en usted hasta ahora. ¡Le contaré mi historia y verá por qué!». {n}Argenta hace una pausa.{/n} «Empezaré por el principio, así me será más fácil explicar las cosas. Al llegar a la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g} y a Paso, no encontré mi destino, sino un tormento. El relicario que se me había encomendado proteger ya estaba a buen recaudo en manos de la misión del reverendo Hieronymus. Además, nadie estaba intentando profanarla. Pese a su falta de leyes, Paso respeta el culto al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「どうかわかってほしい…以前はあなたを信用できなかった。私の話をすれば、その理由がわかるだろう！」{n}アルジェンタは動きを止める。{/n}「始まりから話そう…その方がすべてを理解しやすいだろう。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}とフットフォールに到着したとき、私はここで何の目的も見いだせず、ただ苦しむばかりだった。私は必要なかったのだ…私が守るはずだった聖遺物は、ヒエロニムス司祭の聖務団によってしっかりと守られていた。そして、誰もそれを汚そうともしなかった。その無法ぶりとは対照的に、フットフォールでは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の崇拝が守られているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「どうかわかってほしい…以前はあなたを信用できなかった。私の話をすれば、その理由がわかるだろう！」{n}アルジェンタは動きを止める。{/n}「始まりから話そう…その方がすべてを理解しやすいだろう。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}とフットフォールに到着したとき、私はここで何の目的も見いだせず、ただ苦しむばかりだった。私は必要なかったのだ…私が守るはずだった聖遺物は、ヒエロニムス司祭の聖務団によってしっかりと守られていた。そして、誰もそれを汚そうともしなかった。その無法ぶりぶりとは対照的に、フットフォールでは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の崇拝が守られているのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Versteht bitte ... ich konnte Euch bisher nicht vertrauen. Ich werde Euch meine Geschichte erzählen, dann versteht Ihr den Grund!" {n}Argenta hält kurz inne.{/n} "Ich beginne am Anfang – dann fügt sich alles einfacher zusammen. Bei meiner Ankunft in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} und auf Footfall fand ich hier keine Aufgabe, nur Qual. Ich wurde nicht gebraucht – die Reliquie, die zu bewachen mein Auftrag gewesen war, stand bereits unter dem tadellosen Schutz von Reverend Hieronymus' Mission. Und es gab auch niemanden, der sie entweihen wollte – denn trotz aller Gesetzlosigkeit respektiert Footfall die Verehrung des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Bei meiner Ankunft in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} und auf Footfall fand ich hier keine Aufgabe, nur Qual. Und es gab auch niemanden, der sie entweihen wollte – denn trotz aller Gesetzlosigkeit respektiert Footfall die Verehrung des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous prie de comprendre... Je ne pouvais pas vous accorder ma confiance jusqu'à présent, et mes raisons vous paraîtront évidentes après avoir entendu mon histoire ! » {n}Argenta s'interrompt.{/n} « Je vais commencer du début pour que tout soit parfaitement clair. Lorsque je suis arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et à Castel, je me suis retrouvée perdue, sans fil conducteur. Ma présence n'était plus requise : le reliquaire dont on m'avait confié la garde était déjà sous la protection du révérend Hiéronymus, et personne n'essayait même de le profaner. Castel a beau être un nid de hors-la-loi, l'on y respecte le culte de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de comprendre... Je ne pouvais pas vous accorder ma confiance jusqu'à présent, et mes raisons vous paraîtront évidentes après avoir entendu mon histoire ! » {n}Argenta s'interrompt.{/n} « Je vais commencer du début pour que tout soit parfaitement clair. Lorsque je suis arrivée dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et à Castel, je me suis retrouvée perdue, sans fil conducteur. Ma présence n'était plus requise : le reliquaire dont on m'avait confié la garde était déjà sous la protection du révérend Hiéronymus, et personne n'essayait même de le profaner. Castel a beau être un nid de hors-la-loi, l'on y respecte le culte de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şunu anlamanı rica ediyorum: Önceden sana güvenmem mümkün değildi. Hikâyemi anlattığımda nedenini anlayacaksın!" {n}Argenta duraksıyor.{/n} "En başından anlatacağım. Böylesi ikimiz için de daha rahat olacak. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'e{/g} ve akabinde Binliman'a vardığımda beni karşılayan şey; amacım değil, esaretim oldu. Korumakla görevlendirildiğim kutsal emanet odası, Muhterem Hieronymus'un misyonunun kanatları altındaydı ve bana ihtiyaç yoktu. Kimse kutsala saygısızlık etme teşebbüsünde bulunmuyordu. Binliman'da kanunun esamesi okunmuyor olabilir ancak onlar bile {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} hükmüne boyun eğer."
languages.original_text: "Please understand... I couldn't trust you before. I'll tell you my story, and you'll see why!" {n}Argenta pauses.{/n} "I'll start at the beginning — it's easier to piece everything together that way. Upon arriving in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} and on Footfall, I found no purpose here, only torment. I wasn't needed — the reliquary I had been assigned to safeguard was already well protected by Reverend Hieronymus's mission. And no one was even trying to defile it — for all its lawlessness, Footfall respects the worship of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Şunu anlamanı rica ediyorum: Önceden sana güvenmem mümkün değildi. Hikâyemi anlattığımda nedenini anlayacaksın!" {n}Argenta duraksıyor.{/n} "En başından anlatacağım. Böylesi ikimiz için de daha rahat olacak. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'e ve akabinde Binliman'a vardığımda beni karşılayan şey, amacım değil, esaretim oldu. Korumakla görevlendirildiğim yadigâr, Muhterem Hieronymus'un misyonu tarafından korunmaktaydı ve bana ihtiyaç duyulmuyordu. Kimse kutsala saygısızlık etme teşebbüsünde bulunmadı. Binliman'a kanun işlemiyor olabilir ancak onlar bile {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un hükmüne boyun eğiyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
